PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03622018-03-26TC,  FIN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectAmendments to increase the Prince Rupert Port Authority Borrowing Limit
PrecisOrder Amending the PRINCE RUPERT PORT AUTHORITY LETTERS PATENT in order to increase its borrowing limit, allowing it to further develop its strategic infrastructure and to bring its borrowing limit to a level on par with its current financial capacity.
AttachmentsAttachment
